distance¶

molsysmt.distance(item_1=None, selection_1='all', groups_of_atoms_1=None, group_behavior_1=None, frame_indices_1='all', item_2=None, selection_2=None, groups_of_atoms_2=None, group_behavior_2=None, frame_indices_2=None, pairs=False, crossed_frames=False, pbc=False, parallel=False, output_form='tensor', engine='MolSysMT', syntaxis='MolSysMT')[source]¶
